title: Sutro Baths Ocean View
more info: Sunset from Sutro Baths, showcasing that big rock.

title: Pre-Golden Gate Bridge Construction
more info: An image of the development process of the Golden Gate Bridge. I had this ugly long bridge in the game for a bit because I thought I would have to find someone else to import and make the bridge. Before the initial pre-alpha release, I ended up figuring out how to do it myself and low and behold, the bridge was born. I was so happy to have it in the game.

title: Golden Gate Bridge Sunset
more info: Sunset behin the Golden Gate Bridge. This is where the loading screen position is.

title: First Survivor Crossing Golden Gate Bridge Cables
more info: This is the first survivor to cross the Golden Gate Bridge via the cables. Was exhilarating to see this happen.

title: Ada Boxing Club Uniform

title: End Game Uniform
more info: If you see someone walking around Ada with these clothes on... stay away.

title: Golden Gate Bridge Glitch
more info: Not all of the Golden Gate Bridge has been fixed. There are some parts that do not have hit boxes that I will have to go in an fix later.

title: Sutro Baths Church
more info: Never go to the Church at Sutro Baths, it is dangerous.

title: Alcatraz View of Golden Gate Bridge
more info: Alcatraz is a work in progress. I was initially not going to put it in because I don't know how players would get there. But everyone wanted to swim so I had to put it in.

title: Golden Gate Bridge Cars
more info: Showcasing that the Golden Gate Bridge now has cars on it. Initially... it didn't have cars, which made it very scary to cross, but at least you get some protection now.
